It's important today.

  • Putin told me where the demilitarized line should be in Ukraine.

  • Potina ' s possible visit to Turkey

  • The espionage of Lucius from Herson province described the blackmail of the VU.

  • The EU is threatening to undermine the Hungarian economy if it does not approve Ukraine ' s assistance

  • The Estonian general saw a Russian trail in the creation of a GPS plague in Europe.

  • Ukraine should not count on Berlin ' s support

  • The RF assesses the confiscation of assets by the EU as an act of trade war

  • Irina Volk denied the investigation of the Shaman singer.

  • U.S. Deputy Secretary, Victoria Nuland, came to Ukraine.

  • China thanks Russia for its strong support in the Taiwan question.

  • When you do the haircut and when you sit down, it's a detailed moon calendar for February 2024.

Cases

31.01.2024 14:45

In Permi, the sweet stole 15 boxes from the store and ate them.

One of the network supermarkets directors contacted the police station in Kirov district.

31.01.2024 18:37

Carrier for Substance Carrier crashed in the centre of Saratova

On Wednesday, 31 January, in Saratov, on the street of Celucinians, the LADA Granta Carrier launched an accident with Hyundai.

31.01.2024 16:48

In Novosibirsk, the tenants of many arts complain about a dead smell.

Patrol officers traveled to the site, examined the entrance.

31.01.2024 16:40

The fatal frontal accident occurred on the Narva route

On 31 January, a fatal accident hinders the movement on the federal route Narva in the Quingisep region of Len regions.

31.01.2024 16:27

In Nizhny Novgorod, a man washed away by a woman with a smoking loop of 5 million roubles

Criminal proceedings have been initiated under article 163, paragraph 3, of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (extortion for the purpose of obtaining property in a large amount).

31.01.2024 16:19

Voronage's pensioner sold all the property, borrowed and transferred all the money to the fraudsters.

Criminal proceedings have been instituted under article 159, paragraph 4, of the Criminal Code.

31.01.2024 16:13

They attacked Mokroy Orlovka by throwing explosives on a car.

The drone dropped the explosive device on a car parked at a feldshersco-acuser point.

31.01.2024 16:05

In the Towers, the collaborators attacked the wife of the SVR because of his brother's debts.

In Tveri, the police are looking for a spouse of a PSB member.

31.01.2024 15:44

195 Russian fighters were returned from Ukrainian prisoners.

The Russian side also handed over 195 soldiers to Kiev.

31.01.2024 15:37

In the Voronez region, the mother and her 4-day son died in a terrible accident.

It has been reported that an accident occurred on the M-4 track " Don " in the Pavlov area on 30 January.

31.01.2024 15:28

In Tumen province, a retired woman died in a terrible frontal accident.

Previously, a 35-year-old foreigner fell asleep at the wheel.

31.01.2024 15:19

In Chelabin province, a 15-year-old boy was found dead in an abandoned building.

In the press service of the SC Regional Office URA.RU, it was reported that the investigator had established the circumstances of the incident.

31.01.2024 15:12

Irina Volk denied the investigation of the Shaman singer.

She also invited him to her show.

31.01.2024 15:01

Ex-President Venezprombank Marcus received 13 years in the theft case.

Her partner is hiding in Britain.

31.01.2024 14:02

In Lipetek, the driver was injured in a triple accident.

The police are conducting a background check.

31.01.2024 10:51

At Kuzbass, the driver was walking between trucks carrying him and left a whole thing.

The tragedies escaped only a miracle.

31.01.2024 10:23

The U.S. drone hit a car on Gorlovk Trace-- Donetsk killed two people, neo-Nazis continue to terrorize civilians.

Mayor Gorlovki Ivan Comeko reported details of the tragedy.

31.01.2024 08:18

The loud sound was heard all over Petersburg in the morning, and the peas are lost in speculation.

The residents of the northern capital posted a loud sound video that could even be heard in remote areas of megapolis.

31.01.2024 07:56

In the Vladimir region, there is a shoe storage facility in the area of 2,500 square metres, and 55 fire fires will be fired.

The press service of the Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs has clarified that no information has yet been provided on the victims.

31.01.2024 05:43

A resident of the Khabarov province was placed eight years in a general regime colony for sending money to the SSA

The FSB Regional Office clarified that funds had been diverted to buy weapons for the Ukrainian army.

31.01.2024 05:29

In South Korea, an American F-16 fighter crashed, the pilot survived

We know that a military plane crashed into the sea.

31.01.2024 03:42

The Sahalin Island tanker in the Hot Sea was released from the ice by a rescue tug of the Beering Straits.

Mark Corzhenko, Chief of the Marine Rescue Centre in South Sahalinsk, provided details of the rescue operation.

31.01.2024 03:25

In Zabaikalje, a girl was convicted of brutal murder of a member of the SVR during a drunken stint

The press service of the Tungokochen District Court reported on the progress of the process.

31.01.2024 01:31

The Kaliningrade who, after the fight, stole the hours of 14 million roubles, heard the verdict.

On Tuesday, 30 January, a resident of the Kaliningrad oblast was sentenced for a fight with a later theft of more than ей14 million hours.

31.01.2024 01:25

In Rostov, prison psychiatrists were convicted and two prisoners were killed.

On Tuesday, 30 January, it became known that the Oktyabrsky Rajsud Rostov had sentenced three doctors to prison hospital psychiatrists in the case of torture of prisoners.
